original_title: Two suspects arrested with T-56 ammunitions
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Two suspects were arrested in the Palai in Jaffna along with 690 T-56 ammunition.
Police said that during the inspection of a suspicious motorcycle, the ammunition was recovered packed in a bag belonging to the rider of the motorcycle.
Two people, aged 26 and 33, residing in Ittavil and Senthil Nagar have been arrested.
The State and Public service trade unions collective plans to go on sick leave tomorrow.
A person who illegally imported a consignment of foreign cigarettes into the island arrested at BIA.
A fire has broken out at the Methsiri Sewana building in the Anuradhapura Teaching Hospital
State Minister of Defence says security at the Mihintale sacred site was not removed
